Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Short term, flexible office solutions at The Hub on Hollis. The Hub on Hollis is Halifax's newest, most unique office solution for your business. The opportunity offers well appointed, furnished and modernized office spaces in the beautiful, historic Benjamin Wier building in the heart of Downtown Halifax. Located steps from the amenities of the Brewery Market and the Halifax waterfront, this is an opportunity you don't want to miss. If you are a start-up, growing or established business, the Hub on Hollis can provide a solution to accommodate your evolving business needs. Rental information: - Small office (up to 3 people): $1,500 / month + HST- Medium office (up to 5 people): $1,650 / month + HST- Large office (up to 7 people): $1,800 / month + HST Take advantage of free access to the building's common meeting room, kitchenette and balcony. Minimum 6 month rental required. Internet / data is in addition to the monthly rent.
Flexible office solutions. See the Information Package for more details!

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Centennial Building, located at 1660 Hollis Street in the heart of Downtown Halifax features this high exposure ground floor space which is ideally positioned just steps from the Halifax Waterfront, the Entertainment District and the wide range of amenities in the core. Within steps you will find easy access to transit, surface and covered parking options and Halifax’s best restaurants and services which both staff and clients benefit from.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This 5,318 sq. ft. ground floor sublease opportunity provides your business with the flexibility to adapt to the changing dynamics in the world today. The open concept space provides users with the freedom to distance and circulate throughout the space safely all while feeling connected to colleagues in the open setting. For private client and team meetings, take advantage of the beautifully designed glassed-in boardroom or make your way to the breakout rooms and private offices on the mezzanine level.
See Flyer for more information!
See Flyer for more information!

Cambridge Suites, located at 1591 Brunswick Street in Halifax, is a mixed-use property with retail/commercial, office and hotel. There is 4,400 sq ft available with a dedicated entrance off Brunswick Street and windows facing north and west. The second unit available on Market Street is 1,417 sq ft and is a great creative space with high open ceilings and modern finishes. This space features a dedicated entrance and private washroom. See Flyer for more information!

This fully built out office opportunity offers perimeter private offices with glass sidelights that allow for exceptional natural light to flow into the space, board and meeting rooms to facilitate team meetings and collaboration, interior storage and file areas as well as kitchenettes on both floors. Full length exterior windows and modern LED lighting brighten the space to create an optimal working environment that drives productivity. See flyer for more details.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located at 1877 Hollis Street in the heart of Downtown Halifax, this unique brick and beam office space is ideally positioned just steps from the Historic Properties, the Halifax Waterfront the wide range of amenities in the core. Within steps you will find major transit hubs, surface and covered parking options and Halifax’s best restaurants and services which both staff and clients benefit from. Take advantage of an ideal blend of open concept workspace, private offices and meetings rooms. The large custom built kitchen area, in unit washrooms, open air mezzanine space and internal stairs bring this office space together to create a collaborative work environment that is impossible to replicate.

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line3: Halifax's iconic office towers

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Recognized for innovation and style, Purdy’s stands next to their historic neighbours along the Halifax waterfront. Connecting land,sea, and sky, Purdy’s has become a beacon for the city’s skyline and the leading business hub for Atlantic Canada. Showcasing unsurpassed views of the scenic harbour, Purdy’s boasts a prime location within the heart of downtown Halifax. Offering premium amenities, location and services, the towers provide easy access into the city core through our pedway system. Linking to 70% of the central business district, hotels, covered parking, and public transportation hubs, Purdy’s provides a connection like no other. - See flyer or the below link for more information: https://gwlraleasing.com/index.php?building_group=Purdy%27s%20Wharf&SuiteType=office&show_no_vacancy=on&lang=en_CA

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Sublease opportunity with large open concept floorplate with space for 400 seats, with potential to demise the space to suit smaller footprints. Space includes multiple break rooms, meeting/training rooms, heavy IT infrastructure, showers, and direct interior access to numerous amenities. See flyer for more information!

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located in the heart of downtown Halifax, 2021 Brunswick St is aunique offering with just over 50,000 SF of open plan office spaceon one floor. Located within Scotia Square this space has directinterior access to; downtown pedway system, large food court,retail, fitness, hotels, parking, among other offerings. The space includes multiple break rooms, meeting/training rooms, heavy IT infrastructure, showers, secure entrance and CCTV.

Perfectly located in the heart of Halifax on Spring Garden Road. The building is within walking distance to the central business district with a dedicated parking lot and easy access. The subject property is located within walking distance to major amenities including restaurants, cafés, all major banks, hospitals, Dalhousie and Saint Mary’s University. This is an ideal location for any business looking to be walking distance to downtown but without the traffic and parking congestion. See the Information Package for more details!

Office space with leaseholds in place. Free on-site parking for staff and clients. Flexible term lengths. Walking distance amenities on Spring Garden Road, hospitals and universities. Wheelchair accessible. Located on public transit route. On-site property management. See the Information Package for more details!

This unique office space offers a warm brick and beam feel and is a perfect fit for your business to make a statement with your space. Featuring a great mix of private offices, meeting rooms and open area, these office spaces can meet all of your unique business needs. See the information package for more details!

Located in the growing and vibrant North End of Halifax, the Terrace at 2085 Maitland Street is central to it all. This character filled office building is located just steps from Downtown and the range of restaurants, retailers and services you will find on the nearby Gottingen and Agricola Streets. See the information package for more details!

This unique office space offers a warm brick and beam feel and is a perfect fit for your business to make a statement with your space. Featuring a great mix of private offices, meeting rooms and open area, these office spaces can meet all of your unique business needs. See the information package for more details!

Prime location with direct connection to Shoppers Drug Mart
- Over 15 dedicated parking stalls.
- Separate units, but can be combined.
- Tenant-controlled HVAC.



$19-22 Semi-Gross.

Former medical clinic located on busy Herring Cove Road. The offices are behind an existing new format Shoppers Drug Mart making it an ideal location for a medical practice. Immediate stretch of Herring Cove Rd includes national retailers such as Canadian Tire, McDonalds, RBC, and Sobey's.

Located west of the Halifax Peninsula in the rapidly changing community of Spryfield.  The immediate area has seen a positive transition in the past 5 years with many new residential developments adding to the population, such as Long Lake Village, Governors Brook and Polycorp's Williams Lake developments.  This rapidly growing community features all major amenities and is situated only 15 minutes from downtown Halifax. See the Information Package for more details!

Newly renovated Class A building. Ground floor retail or office spaces. Exposure and great signage opportunities facing Herring Cove Road/ Ample on-site parking. Leasehold Improvements packages available. On a public transit route. ~14,000 vehicles pass per day.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Richmond Yards, is the newest mixed use community currently under construction by Westwood Group, located in the heart of the Halifax Peninsula. Inspired by the vibrant community in the North End and Central Halifax, this neighbourhood will consist of residential, office, retail and commercial space. This walkable neighbourhood will be linked to bike lanes and public transit hubs and is designed for people to live, work and create. Various office spaces available up to 50,000 sq. ft. contiguous. See flyer for more details.
See flyer for more details!

Ideally located at 7075 Bayers Road in central Halifax, this complex is easily accessed from major highways that make travel from surrounding nodes fast and easy. Within the complex you will find many great amenities including pharmacy, restaurants and health services. Free on-site parking and transit is located within close proximity.

Within the complex you will find many great amenities including pharmacy, restaurants and health services. Free on-site parking and transit is located within close proximity.

Located at 70 Lacewood Drive, this large format commercial opportunity is ideally positioned just minutes from Bayers Lake, Bedford and the Halifax Peninsula. Proximal to major highways, high traffic thoroughfares and the McKay Bridge, this location is easily accessed from all directions. This building offers exceptional signage opportunities and visibility on the Lacewood Drive as well as ample on-site parking for staff, clients and customers. Check out the flyer for more!

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
127 Chain Lake Drive is ideally located in Bayers Lake, one of Halifax’s most
prominent commercial nodes. This area is home to more than 300 businesses
including many national retailers and brands, grocers, gas stations and
restaurants; all of which benefit from the growing multi-residential
communities nearby. Positioned just minutes from the Halifax Peninsula and the
Port, easily accessed by transit and the 100 series highway, 127 Chain Lake
Drive is a location you can’t miss.
